page.title: 20Henry Prince First School.3
page.content: Things we do. Comments by Class 3. We do Mathematics each day. The sums we do are addition,subtraction, multiplication and division and plenty of topic maths as well. Our school has a football team.The team colours are blue and red.We play with 7 players and two reserves. On Monday afternoons the girls have gymnastics.There are four Awards in the British Amateur Gymnastics Association scheme. There are ten tests in each Award. We write a diary about the things that happen to us at the weekend,where we go and things like that.In English we read stories and answer questions. Sometimes we paint pictures and make models. COMPILED BY MRS.P.A.HADDON AND MR.N.A. ADDLEY, AIDED BY CLASS 3 AND FRIENDS.
